title: What is the background music in this video at 16:45? - Quora

response.answer_text: The secret you (2009)- this is a wonderful documentary hosted by marcus du sautoy. can anyone please help in identifying the background music at : 16:43 in the video. i feel it sounds like a long harp. thanks in advance for the help. Video Link —
Not sure on the instrument. Possibly a Moog type synthesizer. Good luck finding this one.
